info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 10:18PM EDT until July 26 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR CLARION COUNTY... At 1017 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rimersburg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Clarion, Knox, Rimersburg, Parker, Sligo, Emlenton, Strattanville, Limestone, Shippenville, St. Petersburg, Corsica, Callensburg, Foxburg, Fisher, and Leeper. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
